attributes.name: Arniel's Convection
attributes.description: Burns target 1 point per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Ash Rune
attributes.description: Cast on a nearby surface, explodes when enemies are nearby, immobilizing them in hardened ash for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Ash Shell
attributes.description: Targets that fail to resist are immobilized in hardened ash for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Bane of the Undead
attributes.description: Sets undead up to level 30 on fire and makes them flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Banish Daedra
attributes.description: Send lesser Daedra back to Oblivion.

attributes.name: Blizzard
attributes.description: 20 Frost damage per second for 10 seconds.

attributes.name: Bound Battleaxe
attributes.description: Creates a magic battle axe for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

attributes.name: Bound Bow
attributes.description: Equips an ethereal Daedric Bow and 100 ethereal Daedric Arrows for 120 seconds.

attributes.name: Bound Dagger
attributes.description: Creates a magic dagger for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

attributes.name: Bound Sword
attributes.description: Creates a magic sword for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

attributes.name: Call to Arms
attributes.description: Targets have improved combat skills, health, and stamina for 10 minutes.

attributes.name: Calm
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 9 won't fight for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Candlelight
attributes.description: Creates a hovering light that lasts for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Chain Lightning
attributes.description: Lightning bolt that does 40 (min) shock damage to Health and half to Magicka, then leaps to new target.

attributes.name: Circle of Protection
attributes.description: Undead up to level 20 entering the circle will flee.

attributes.name: Clairvoyance
attributes.description: Draws a path to the next objective.

attributes.name: Close Wounds
attributes.description: Restores 100 points of health to the caster.

attributes.name: Command Daedra
attributes.description: Powerful summoned and raised creatures are put under the caster's control.

attributes.name: Conjure Ash Guardian
attributes.description: Creates an Ash Guardian that guards that location until destroyed. Consumes a heart stone from your inventory, without which it will be hostile.

attributes.name: Conjure Ash Spawn
attributes.description: Summons an Ash Spawn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Conjure Boneman
attributes.description: Summons a Boneman Archer from the Soul Cairn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Conjure Dragon Priest
attributes.description: Summons a spectral Dragon Priest.

attributes.name: Conjure Dremora Lord
attributes.description: Summons a Dremora Lord for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Conjure Familiar
attributes.description: Summons a familiar for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Conjure Flame Atronach
attributes.description: Summons a Flame Atronach for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Conjure Flaming Familiar
attributes.description: Summons a flaming familiar which will charge into battle and explode.

attributes.name: Conjure Frost Atronach
attributes.description: Summons a Frost Atronach for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Conjure Mistman
attributes.description: Summons a Mistman from the Soul Cairn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Conjure Seeker
attributes.description: Summons a Seeker for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Conjure Storm Atronach
attributes.description: Summons a Storm Atronach for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Conjure Wrathman
attributes.description: Summons a Wrathman from the Soul Cairn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Courage
attributes.description: Target won't flee for 60 seconds and gets some extra health and stamina.

attributes.name: Dead Thrall
attributes.description: Reanimate a dead body permanently to fight for you. Only works on people.

attributes.name: Detect Dead
attributes.description: Nearby dead can be seen through walls.

attributes.name: Detect Life
attributes.description: Nearby living creatures, but not undead, machines, or daedra, can be seen through walls.

attributes.name: Dragonhide
attributes.description: Caster ignores 80% of all physical damage.

attributes.name: Dread Zombie
attributes.description: Reanimate a very powerful dead body to fight for you for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Ebonyflesh
attributes.description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 100 points for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Equilibrium
attributes.description: Convert health into magicka at 25 points per second. Caster can be killed by this effect.

attributes.name: Expel Daedra
attributes.description: Powerful summoned daedra creatures are sent back to Oblivion.

attributes.name: Fade Other
attributes.description: Target is invisible for 30 seconds. Activating an object or attacking will break the spell.

attributes.name: Fast Healing
attributes.description: Heals the caster for 50 points.

attributes.name: Fear
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 9 flee from combat for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Fire Rune
attributes.description: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for 50 points of fire damage when enemies come near.

attributes.name: Fire Storm
attributes.description: Summons a fire storm that deals 100 damage.

attributes.name: Fireball
attributes.description: A fiery explosion for 40 points of damage in a 15 foot radius. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Firebolt
attributes.description: A blast of fire that does 25 points of damage. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Flame Cloak
attributes.description: For 60 seconds, opponents in melee range take 8 points fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Flame Thrall
attributes.description: Summons a Flame Atronach permanently.

attributes.name: Flames
attributes.description: A gout of fire that does 8 points per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Freeze
attributes.description: A spike of ice that does 20 points of frost damage to Health and Stamina and slows the target for 15 seconds.

attributes.name: Frenzy
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 14 will attack anyone nearby for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Frenzy Rune
attributes.description: Targets up to level 20 that fail to resist are frenzied for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Frost Cloak
attributes.description: For 60 seconds, opponents in melee range take 8 points frost damage and Stamina damage per second.

attributes.name: Frost Rune
attributes.description: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for 50 points of frost damage when enemies come near.

attributes.name: Frost Thrall
attributes.description: Summons a Frost Atronach permanently.

attributes.name: Frostbite
attributes.description: A blast of cold that does 8 points of damage per second to Health and Stamina.

attributes.name: Fury
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 6 will attack anything nearby for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Grand Healing
attributes.description: Heals everyone close to the caster 200 points.

attributes.name: Greater Ward
attributes.description: Increases armor rating by 80 points and negates up to 80 points of spell damage or effects.

attributes.name: Guardian Circle
attributes.description: Undead up to level 35 entering the circle will flee. Caster heals 20 health per second inside it.

attributes.name: Harmony
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 25 nearby won't fight for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Heal Other
attributes.description: Heals the target 75 points, but not undead, atronachs or machines.

attributes.name: Heal Undead
attributes.description: Heals the undead target 75 points, but not the living, atronachs or machines.

attributes.name: Healing
attributes.description: Heals the caster 10 points per second.

attributes.name: Healing Hands
attributes.description: Heals the target 10 points per second, but not undead, atronachs, or machines.

attributes.name: Hysteria
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 25 flee from combat.

attributes.name: Ice Spike
attributes.description: Throw a spike of ice that does 25 points of frost damage to Health and Stamina.

attributes.name: Ice Storm
attributes.description: A freezing whirlwind that does 40 points of frost damage per second to Health and Stamina.

attributes.name: Icy Spear
attributes.description: A spear of ice that does 60 points of Frost Damage to Health and Stamina.

attributes.name: Ignite
attributes.description: A blast of flame that sets targets on fire, doing 4 damage per second for 15 seconds.

attributes.name: Incinerate
attributes.description: A blast of fire that does 60 points of damage. Targets on fire take extra damage.

attributes.name: Invisibility
attributes.description: Caster is invisible for 30 seconds. Activating an object or attacking will break the spell.

attributes.name: Ironflesh
attributes.description: Improves caster's armor rating by 80 points for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Lesser Ward
attributes.description: Increases armor rating by 40 points and negates up to 40 points of spell damage or effects.

attributes.name: Lightning Bolt
attributes.description: A bolt of lightning that does 25 points of shock damage to health and half that to magicka.

attributes.name: Lightning Cloak
attributes.description: For 60 seconds, nearby opponents take 8 points of shock damage and half magicka damage.

attributes.name: Lightning Rune
attributes.description: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for 50 points of shock damage when enemies come near.

attributes.name: Lightning Storm
attributes.description: Target takes 75 points of shock damage per second to health, and half that to magicka.

attributes.name: Magelight
attributes.description: Cast a ball of light that lasts 60 seconds and sticks where it strikes.

attributes.name: Mass Paralysis
attributes.description: All targets in the area that fail to resist are paralyzed for 15 seconds.

attributes.name: Mayhem
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 25 will attack anyone nearby for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Muffle
attributes.description: You move more quietly for 180 seconds.

attributes.name: Necromantic Healing
attributes.description: Heals the undead target for 10 points per second.

attributes.name: Oakflesh
attributes.description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 40 points for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Pacify
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 20 won't fight for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Paralyze
attributes.description: Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for 10 seconds.

attributes.name: Poison Rune
attributes.description: Targets that fail to resist take 3 points of poison damage per second for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Raise Zombie
attributes.description: Reanimate a weak dead body to fight for you for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Rally
attributes.description: Targets won't flee and will get extra health and stamina.

attributes.name: Reanimate Corpse
attributes.description: Reanimate a more powerful dead body to fight for you for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Repel Lesser Undead
attributes.description: All affected undead up to level 8 flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Repel Undead
attributes.description: All affected undead up to level 16 flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Revenant
attributes.description: Reanimate a powerful dead body to fight for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Rout
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 20 flee from combat for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Soul Trap
attributes.description: If target dies within 60 seconds, fills a soul gem.

attributes.name: Sparks
attributes.description: Lightning that does 8 points of shock damage to health and magicka per second.

attributes.name: Spectral Arrow
attributes.description: Causes 30 damage to health and causes target to stagger.

attributes.name: Steadfast Ward
attributes.description: Increases armor rating by 60 points and negates up to 60 points of spell damage or effects.

attributes.name: Stendarr's Aura
attributes.description: For 60 seconds, undead in melee range take 10 points of Sun damage per second.

attributes.name: Stoneflesh
attributes.description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 60 points for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Storm Thrall
attributes.description: Summons a Storm Atronach permanently.

attributes.name: Summon Arniel's Shade
attributes.description: Summons Arniel's Shade wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Summon Arvak
attributes.description: Summons Arvak in the Soul Cairn or Tamriel wilderness to act as your steed.

attributes.name: Summon Unbound Dremora
attributes.description: Summons an unbound Dremora.

attributes.name: Sun Fire
attributes.description: Ball of sunlight that does 25 points of damage to undead.

attributes.name: Telekinesis
attributes.description: Can pull an object from a distance. Add it to the inventory or throw it.

attributes.name: Thunderbolt
attributes.description: Cast a thunderbolt that does 60 points of shock damage to health and half that to magicka.

attributes.name: Transmute Mineral Ore
attributes.description: Transmutes one piece of iron ore to silver ore, or silver ore to gold ore, if the caster is carrying any.

attributes.name: Turn Greater Undead
attributes.description: Undead up to level 21 flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Turn Lesser Undead
attributes.description: Undead up to level 6 flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Turn Undead
attributes.description: Undead up to level 13 flee for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Vampire's Bane
attributes.description: Sunlight explosion that does 40 points of damage in a 15 foot radius to undead.

attributes.name: Vampire's Seduction
attributes.description: Calms creatures and people up to level 10 for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Vampiric Drain
attributes.description: Drains 2 health from target enemies and heals the caster simultaneously.

attributes.name: Vision of the Tenth Eye
attributes.description: See what others cannot.

attributes.name: Wall of Flames
attributes.description: Sprayed on the ground, it creates a wall of fire that does 50 points of fire damage per second.

attributes.name: Wall of Frost
attributes.description: Sprayed on the ground, it creates a wall of frost that does 50 points of frost damage per second.

attributes.name: Wall of Storms
attributes.description: Sprayed on the ground, it creates a wall of lightning that does 50 points of shock damage per second.

attributes.name: Waterbreathing
attributes.description: Breathe underwater for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Whirlwind Cloak
attributes.description: For 60 seconds, opponents in melee range have a chance of being flung away.
